EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the download you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Hello {{lead.First Name}},
Here is your copy of Rethinking the field area network for grid automation to download and share. DOWNLOAD THE WHITE PAPER <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200750]]> For more information on field area network (FAN) for power utilities:
- Visit: networks.nokia.com/power-utilities/field-area-network <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/field-area-network-power-utilities]]> - Read the article: Smarter Grids Need LTE <[[http://world-gen.com/magazine/2016/nov-dec/book/assets/basic-html/page-8.html]]> - Watch the video: Nokia Converged Field Area Network (FAN) <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gLPhOarGURw&feature=youtu.be]]> Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
